name: fortinet-fortiweb-cloud
label: Fortinet FortiWeb Cloud
description: FortiWeb Cloud is an cloud native SaaS based web application firewall (WAF) that protects web applications.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the FortiWeb Cloud server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the FortiWeb Cloud server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.description: Specify the API key to access the endpoint to connect and perform the automated operations
fields.name: api_key
fields.tooltip: Specify the API key to access the endpoint to connect and perform the automated operations

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is selected, i.e., set to true.
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is selected, i.e., set to true.

operations.title: Get Incident Dashboard Details
operations.description: Retrieves information for the global setting configurations from FortiWeb Cloud based on the widget name, action name, and other filter criteria you have specified.

parameters.title: Widget Name
parameters.description: Select the name of the widget based on which to filter the incident dashboard retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud. You can choose from the following options: Threats Timeline, Incidents Timeline, Country, Attack Type, High Risk, or Http Host.
parameters.tooltip: Select the name of the widget based on which to filter the incident dashboard retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud. You can choose from the following options: Threats Timeline, Incidents Timeline, Country, Attack Type, High Risk, or Http Host.
parameters.name: widget_id

parameters.title: Action Name
parameters.description: Select the action name based on which to filter the incident dashboard retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud. You can choose from the following options: All, Block, or Monitor.
parameters.tooltip: Select the action name based on which to filter the incident dashboard retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud. You can choose from the following options: All, Block, or Monitor.
parameters.name: action

parameters.title: Host Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the host based on which to retrieve information from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the host based on which to retrieve information from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.name: host

parameters.title: Time Range
parameters.description: Specify the time range during which the incidents were created in FortiWeb Cloud, and from to retrieve incident dashboard details. For example: 24h or 7d to fetch incidents from the last 24 hours or 7 days, respectively.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the time range during which the incidents were created in FortiWeb Cloud, and from to retrieve incident dashboard details. For example: 24h or 7d to fetch incidents from the last 24 hours or 7 days, respectively.
parameters.name: time_range

operations.title: Get Incidents List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all incidents from FortiWeb Cloud based on the time range and other filter criteria you have specified.

parameters.title: Time Range
parameters.description: Specify the time range during which the incidents were created in FortiWeb Cloud, and from to retrieve incident dashboard details. For example: 24h or 7d to fetch incidents from the last 24 hours or 7 days, respectively.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the time range during which the incidents were created in FortiWeb Cloud, and from to retrieve incident dashboard details. For example: 24h or 7d to fetch incidents from the last 24 hours or 7 days, respectively.
parameters.name: time_range

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.description: Specify multiple key/value pairs in JSON format to filter incidents retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.tooltip: Specify multiple key/value pairs in JSON format to filter incidents retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.name: filter

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.description: Specify the number of results, per page, that to include in the response of this operation.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of results, per page, that to include in the response of this operation.
parameters.name: size

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.description: Specify the page number from which to fetch incidents from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to fetch incidents from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.name: page

operations.title: Get Incident Details
operations.description: Retrieves information for a specific incident from FortiWeb Cloud based on the incident ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the incident whose details are to be retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the incident whose details are to be retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.name: incident_id

operations.title: Get Incident Timeline Details
operations.description: Retrieves information for a specific incident timeline from FortiWeb Cloud based on the incident ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the incident whose timeline details are to be retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the incident whose timeline details are to be retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.name: incident_id

operations.title: Get Insight Events Summary
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all insight events summary from FortiWeb Cloud.

operations.title: Get Incident Aggregated Details
operations.description: Retrieves information for a specific incident aggregated from FortiWeb Cloud based on the incident ID and group by parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the incident whose aggregated details are to be retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the incident whose aggregated details are to be retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.name: incident_id

parameters.title: Group By
parameters.description: Select the grouping criteria based on which to filter incident aggregated details retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud. Select Logs to get sample attack logs of a specific incident. You can choose from the following options: Logs, Attack Type, Source Country, HTTP Host, HTTP URL, Source IP, Signature CVE ID, or OWASP TOP10.
parameters.tooltip: Select the grouping criteria based on which to filter incident aggregated details retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud. Select Logs to get sample attack logs of a specific incident. You can choose from the following options: Logs, Attack Type, Source Country, HTTP Host, HTTP URL, Source IP, Signature CVE ID, or OWASP TOP10.
parameters.name: name

operations.title: Get Insight Events
operations.description: Retrieves information for insight events from FortiWeb Cloud based on the event type and other filter criteria you have specified.

parameters.title: Event Type
parameters.description: Select the type of the event based on which to filter insight events retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud. You can choose from the following options: Exposed Server, Trust IP, Unprotected Host, Monitor Service, or WAF Config Alarm.
parameters.tooltip: Select the type of the event based on which to filter insight events retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud. You can choose from the following options: Exposed Server, Trust IP, Unprotected Host, Monitor Service, or WAF Config Alarm.
parameters.name: type

parameters.title: Cursor
parameters.description: Specify the cursor value based on which to filter insight events retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud. Leave the cursor value empty, to list the items of the first page. Use the value of the next_cursor parameter, returned in the result of the current page, to go forward to next page. Use the value of the prev_cursor parameter, returned in the result of the current page, to go to the previous page.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the cursor value based on which to filter insight events retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud. Leave the cursor value empty, to list the items of the first page. Use the value of the next_cursor parameter, returned in the result of the current page, to go forward to next page. Use the value of the prev_cursor parameter, returned in the result of the current page, to go to the previous page.
parameters.name: cursor

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.description: Specify the number of results, per page, to include in the response of this operation. The values can be 10, 20, or 30.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of results, per page, to include in the response of this operation. The values can be 10, 20, or 30.
parameters.name: size

parameters.title: Forward
parameters.description: Select this option to fetch records from the next page. Clear this checkbox to fetch records from the previous page.
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to fetch records from the next page. Clear this checkbox to fetch records from the previous page.
parameters.name: forward

operations.title: Get IP Protection
operations.description: Retrieves IP protection configuration from FortiWeb Cloud based on the application ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Application ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the application based on which you want to retrieve IP protection details from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.name: epid
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the application based on which you want to retrieve IP protection details from FortiWeb Cloud.

operations.title: Add IP Protection
operations.description: Adds an IP protection configuration in FortiWeb Cloud based on the application ID, IP type, and IP address you have specified.

parameters.title: Application ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the application to add IP protection details in FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.name: epid
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the application to add IP protection details in FortiWeb Cloud.

parameters.title: IP Type
parameters.description: Select the type of the IP operation to add in FortiWeb Cloud. You can choose from the following options: Trust IP, Block IP, or Allow Only IP.
parameters.name: iptype
parameters.tooltip: Select the type of the IP operation to add in FortiWeb Cloud. You can choose from the following options: Trust IP, Block IP, or Allow Only IP.

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.description: Specify the IP address of the application to add in FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.name: ipaddress
parameters.tooltip: Specify the IP address of the application to add in FortiWeb Cloud. It can be a single IP or a range of addresses (e.g., 172.22.14.1-172.22.14.256 or 10:200::10:1-10:200:10:100)

operations.title: Delete IP Protection
operations.description: Deletes a specific IP protection configuration from FortiWeb Cloud based on the application ID, IP type, and IP address you have specified.

parameters.title: Application ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the application to delete associated IP protection details from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.name: epid
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the application to delete associated IP protection details from FortiWeb Cloud.

parameters.title: IP Type
parameters.description: Select the type of the IP operation being deleted from FortiWeb Cloud. You can choose from the following options: Trust IP, Block IP, or Allow Only IP.
parameters.name: iptype
parameters.tooltip: Select the type of the IP operation being deleted from FortiWeb Cloud. You can choose from the following options: Trust IP, Block IP, or Allow Only IP.

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.description: Specify the IP address of the application being deleted from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.name: ipaddress
parameters.tooltip: Specify the IP address of the application being deleted from FortiWeb Cloud. It can be a single IP or a range of addresses (e.g., 172.22.14.1-172.22.14.256 or 10:200::10:1-10:200:10:100)

operations.title: Get Applications List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all applications from FortiWeb Cloud based on the filter criteria you have specified.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify key-value pairs in JSON format to filter applications retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify key-value pairs in JSON format to filter applications retrieved from FortiWeb Cloud. The available "id" of filter are ["app_name", "domain_name", "block_mode", "platform", "owner", "data", "blocked_req", "req", "assign_to", "template_name"]
parameters.name: filter

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the number of results, per page, to include in the response of this operation.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the number of results, per page, to include in the response of this operation. The value shall be 10, 20, 30.
parameters.name: size

parameters.title: Cursor
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a cursor value if a previous operation returned a partial result. To go forward to next page, specify the value of the next_cursor parameter from the response. To go to the previous page, specify the prev_cursor value.
parameters.name: cursor
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify a cursor value if a previous operation returned a partial result. To go forward to next page, specify the value of the next_cursor parameter from the response. To go to the previous page, specify the prev_cursor value.

operations.title: Update Geo IP Block List
operations.description: Block requests from client by geography by updating the Geo IP Block list based on the Application ID, Countries, and other input paramters you have specified.

parameters.title: Application ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the application in which you want to update the Geo IP Block.
parameters.name: epid
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the application in which you want to update the Geo IP Block

parameters.title: Operation To Perform
parameters.description: Select the type of operation to perform on the Geo IP Block List. You can choose from the following options: Add Countries To Block List or Remove Countries From Block List.
parameters.name: operation_to_perform
parameters.tooltip: Select the type of operation to perform on the Geo IP Block List

parameters.title: Countries
parameters.description: Select one or more countries, to block requests from clients by geography.
parameters.name: block_country_list
parameters.tooltip: Select one or more countries, to block requests from clients by geography
options: South Georgia And The South Sandwich Islands
